title: ValueError: ('Invalid augmenter type:', 'scalecrop')
body:
Hello my Name is Albert Moreno, in this moment i am trying to use DeepLabCut , but i have a problem when i am using DeepLabCut (in this moment i just followed the tutorial (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IOWtKn3l33s)) **Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version** Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & deeplabcut 2.1.8.2 **Describe the problem** My problem occurs when appears the next message : ``` ValueError Traceback (most recent call last) ~/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/DeepLabCut/examples/testscript.py in 237 print("CREATING TRAININGSET") 238 deeplabcut.create_training_dataset( --> 239 path_config_file, net_type=net_type, augmenter_type=augmenter_type2 240 ) 241 ~/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/trainingsetmanipulation.py in create_training_dataset(config, num_shuffles, Shuffles, windows2linux, userfeedback, trainIndexes, testIndexes, net_type, augmenter_type) 650 pass 651 else: --> 652 raise ValueError('Invalid augmenter type:', augmenter_type) 653 654 import deeplabcut ValueError: ('Invalid augmenter type:', 'scalecrop') ``` Please place code inside this:
Code output

``` [--------------------------------------------------------------------------- ValueError Traceback (most recent call last) ~/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/DeepLabCut/examples/testscript.py in 237 print("CREATING TRAININGSET") 238 deeplabcut.create_training_dataset( --> 239 path_config_file, net_type=net_type, augmenter_type=augmenter_type2 240 ) 241 ~/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/trainingsetmanipulation.py in create_training_dataset(config, num_shuffles, Shuffles, windows2linux, userfeedback, trainIndexes, testIndexes, net_type, augmenter_type) 650 pass 651 else: --> 652 raise ValueError('Invalid augmenter type:', augmenter_type) 653 654 import deeplabcut ValueError: ('Invalid augmenter type:', 'scalecrop') ] ```
